iframe.src: <xsl:text>//rcm</xsl:text> <xsl:if test="@tld and contains('cadefritjpuk',@tld)">-<xsl:value-of select="@tld"/></xsl:if> <xsl:text>.amazon.</xsl:text> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="@tld='jp' or @tld='uk'">co.<xsl:value-of select="@tld"/></xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@tld and contains('cadefrit',@tld)"><xsl:value-of select="@tld"/></xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>com</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <xsl:text>/e/cm?lt1=_blank&bc1=FFFFFF&bg1=FFFFFF&fc1=000000&lc1=0000FF&p=8&l=as1&f=ifr&asins=</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="@id"/> <xsl:text>&o=</xsl:text> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="@tld='ca'">15</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@tld='de'">3</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@tld='fr'">8</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@tld='it'">29</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@tld='jp'">9</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@tld='uk'">2</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>1</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <xsl:text>&t=</xsl:text> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$AMAZON_ASSOCIATE_TAG"><xsl:value-of select="$AMAZON_ASSOCIATE_TAG"/></xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>_</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose>

site.name: The Daily Show with Jon Stewart
Kickstarter
site.template: <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="@video"> <iframe width="480" height="360" src="//www.kickstarter.com/projects/{@id}/widget/video.html" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <iframe width="220" height="380" src="//www.kickstarter.com/projects/{@id}/widget/card.html" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose>

iframe.src: <xsl:text>https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=</xsl:text> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="@secret_token and @playlist_id"> <xsl:text>https://api.soundcloud.com/playlists/</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="@playlist_id"/> <xsl:text>&secret_token=</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="@secret_token"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@secret_token and @track_id"> <xsl:text>https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="@track_id"/> <xsl:text>&secret_token=</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="@secret_token"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="not(contains(@id, '://'))"> <xsl:text>https://soundcloud.com/</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="@id"/> <xsl:if test="@secret_token"> <xsl:text>&secret_token=</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="@secret_token"/> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose>

site.name: Vine
site.template: <iframe width="480" height="480" src="https://vine.co/v/{@id}/embed/simple" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"/><script async="" src="//platform.vine.co/static/scripts/embed.js" charset="utf-8"/>

iframe.src: <xsl:text>//www.youtube.com/embed/</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="@id"/> <xsl:text>?controls=2</xsl:text> <xsl:if test="@list"> <xsl:text>&list=</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="@list"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="@t or @m"> <xsl:text>&start=</xsl:text> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="@t"> <xsl:value-of select="@t"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="@h"> <xsl:value-of select="@h * 3600 + @m * 60 + @s"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="@m * 60 + @s"/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:if>
